attributes.review: this app legit took $30 out of my account. I didn’t put in my credit card info or anything. I think it used the information/hacked onto my phone to get my credit card number. Seriously ban this app it’s a scam.
attributes.title: CHARGED ME MONEY

attributes.review: I don’t agree with all of theee genz millennial kids in here trying to be mean to trump. I wanted this app because i wants to support trumps but this app is just not good. It’s always crashing and is not user friendly. Please fix. Please.
attributes.title: Not user friendly

attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE, SO BAD. The first time I tried using this app my phone randomly grew legs and starting smashing itself against the window. I was horrified. I do not recommend this app❤️settle for Biden. Also every time I open the app it starts screaming racial slurs at me and starts sexually abusing me?👁👄👁
attributes.title: Donald’s toe jam

attributes.review: this has nothing to do with my feelings towards trump, i support him but this app was done horribly and upon downloading, i was surprised to see that the app would crash every time i use it. also, upon opening the app i noticed that every time i would try to exit the app it would not allow me. i had to power my phone off to even use my phone. juts a horrible quality app in general . 👎👎👎
attributes.title: just poor quality

attributes.review: Hi, this app is terrible!! 🤬🤬🤬🤬 I love our president donald trump 😀 but this app sent a whole giraffe to my door!! Granted, it was stuffed, and it was a prize because of my loyalty, but they MADE ME PAY FOR IT!!! Not to mention the monkey that was alive and in the package with it; it went into the nearby woods and now I’m scared I’m going to get sued!! 😡😡😡😡 -Karen Smith
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP IM NEED TO SPEAK TO THE MANAGER

attributes.review: This app will steal your girl and hurt your family please do not download it😑 like I was walking my cat and feeding him a burger when all of a sudden, the orange Cheeto puff lookin man comes out of my phone and threatened me😰🥰 so please do not download, Trump is crazy and he will possess your phone🙃😨😓
attributes.title: Big Ole Freak🤡🤡🤡

attributes.review: This app has been taking my personal information!! It even has the audacity to ask me for my location! This is terrible and the App Store should do something about it!!
attributes.title: Personal info

attributes.review: I originally downloaded the app so I could stay up to date with the amazing Cheeto . But my phone has since not let me open any apps . Everytime I try it crashes . 😑
attributes.title: Awful completely awful

attributes.review: this app is the worst!! it refused to let my use my month old coupons to get benefits, and called my child a she-troll after stuffing her in the oven in a 13x9 inch pan to cook at 375 degrees for 30 minutes 😡😡😡 disgusting. would give it zero stars if I could.
attributes.title: gross ✨🧚‍♀️💗

attributes.review: I would give 0 stars if possible my phone kept crashing and eventually wouldn’t charge. I had to take it to a repair shop to get it fix. For a “free” app it sure did cost me a lot of money
attributes.title: Awful!
